website_summaries.verdict: The Fresh Accents Kitchen is made from plastic and is durable in construction. Although assembly may be problematic, the kitchen with its included accessories is attractive, compact and a great choice for the price.
pros: The Step2 Lifestyle Fresh Accents Kitchen is compact and includes a two-burner cooktop, a refigerator with ice maker, a microwave, an oven and a sink
The appliances make noise and have lights, and it includes a 30-piece accessory kit
cons: Assembly may be difficult, although most users say a standard screwdriver will do the job
While there is enough storage for the included accessories, there isn't much space for extras

customer_reviews.title: Looks really nice, so I bought it as a gift for ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my daughter's 2nd birthday since she likes to pretend she's cooking when I'm cooking. It looks really nice, good size and all. However the oven door does not close properly. It swings open to the floor when you try to close it. The cabinets does not stay closed all the way. The refrigerator door keeps falling out when my daughter opens it. It's really sad to see her open the fridge to put her make believe food in it and the door falls out on the floor. Smh
customer_reviews.author: Shantel

customer_reviews.title: My toddler twins LOVE this kitchen
customer_reviews.text: My toddler twins LOVE this kitchen. They're almost two and the kitchen still is a great size for them to grow into.
customer_reviews.author: Karina Brown

customer_reviews.title: Not worth your money. CHEAP
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap. I bought this for my grandkids as a Christmas gift and was really disappointed. The plastic doors were bent coming out of the box. You can see the distress in the plastic. I would have returned howevywe had thrown the box out and too much trouble for such a large item. Do yourself a favor and spend a little more on a Little Tikes kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Brenyolds

customer_reviews.title: Great size for a 2 year old, but poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size for my 2 year old - she can reach everything. When I took it out of the box I noticed a huge gouge on the back piece but it didn't seem worth boxing it back up to send back since we were going to have it against a wall anyway. It is supposed to be designed so you can use the pass-through, though, in which case the back would show. Like other reviewers have mentioned, the plates won't fit in the cabinets, so that's a bit disappointing. They will fit in the refrigerator and oven. The burner and microwave sounds are neat. My toddler loves the phone, too.
customer_reviews.author: nerdgirl78664

customer_reviews.title: Happy toddler, happy mama
customer_reviews.text: I am not going to lie. I dreaded this Christmas gift coming in since I didn’t want to assemble it. So the fact it was coming in after Christmas made me excited. Well I was extremely pleased this was delivered Christmas Eve and it made our child so excited to see it Christmas morning. SUPER easy and quick to assemble. Not a million parts like I was dreading. Had to ready to play within minutes. It’s compact enough for our smaller area, but gives hours of fun for our kid.
customer_reviews.author: James.partyof4

customer_reviews.title: Step 2 means quality!
customer_reviews.text: You can’t go wrong with Step2. This was a bday present for our granddaughter who turned 2 yesterday. She loves it. I thought maybe it would be too tall for her but it’s the perfect height and holds her interest! The sounds of sizzling frying pan, microwave buttons and plenty of storage space kept her busy for hours. Very happy with the product and the delivery of the item. Very sturdy and it will be well loved for a long time to come
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Peck

customer_reviews.title: great Christmas Gift
customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely loved this for Christmas, and didn't want to open any other gifts. It was pretty easy and quick to put together (took about an hour). At first I was upset that it did not have pre-drilled holes, but that makes perfect sense with it being plastic, and with an electric screwdriver, the screws went in pretty easy. the only complaint i have is the size of the screws were you need to place batteries are oddly sized and I still have not been able to put batteries in the telephone, because I cant get the screw out. Other than that, my daughter really loves her new kitchen. It is very sturdy and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Tameika Rease

customer_reviews.title: Fun for play but poorly manufactured
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my 3 year old granddaughter and, although she is having great fun with it, I noticed the same problems as other reviewers. Gouges in the plastic. Warped cabinet doors (which were pre-attached) thus not closing properly. Why are there no pre-drilled holes for screws for assembly? This is such a simple fix that would make a world of difference in the assembly. Fortunately, my granddaughter isn’t old enough to notice these deficiencies. If I needed to buy another one, I’d get a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: sma5320874

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy for Granddaughter
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my granddaughter and she plays with it all the time. She was only 18 mos old and can reach everything. Her older boy cousins play with her and they stay entertained and enjoy all the features. Wasn’t hard putting together, but it did require time to get it done. Don’t wait until the last minute to put together. Great buy! Appears to be made well and should last for many years.
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: Cute kitchen for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute kitchen for the price. My boys love cooking in it. This is a great size that does not take up too much space. Kids love the accessories and noises the phone, microwave and stove makes. Downsides we experienced? 1. Doors do not close all the way 2. Dishes do not fit in the little cabinets 3. Sticker trim around the top doesn't stay on very well Also, ours came without the entire accessory kit and hardware pack, so we had to wait for the manufacturer to send it to us. Our kids don't care about the downsides though and enjoy the kitchen. Just be prepared it will probably be missing something you need from the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy and disappointed Grandma :(
customer_reviews.text: Very upset with this product. Ordered it for my 1st granddaughter for CHRISTmas and had it delivered to her house. We flew up the weekend before CHRISTmas to celebrate the holiday with her. When she opened it and we went to put it together, it had no directions and was missing the stickers for the cabinets, microwave and oven. If the company will send these missing items, I will be a little less unhappy but if they don't, I am sending the package back and buying a Little Tikes Kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: perfect size for my 3 yr old
customer_reviews.text: I had been searching for one of these and was happy to find many different options however I also had to consider the space we had in our home as there isn't much storage area. this kitchen was the perfect size and it has enough features which makes it very interactive and that much more interesting for my toddler. She wanted a kitchen just like mommy's and is beyond excited with her new toy. I only wish it was available in different colors but overall very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: I am completely happy with his product and my child absolutely adores it
customer_reviews.text: The only problems I have with this product are: 1. I had to call the company and separately order the decals. 2. You must own a drill to put this together. Even though the directions say to use a Phillips head screwdriver. There is no way I would have been able to put his together properly without a drill. Other than those two things, I am completely happy with his product and my child absolutely adores it.
customer_reviews.author: Jayi8

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a "seconds" product - edges aren't smooth and there are scratches
customer_reviews.text: Overall, cute product (dated in style if that matters to some, but didn't to me) but not as good a quality as I had expected. Wouldn't purchase this again from Amazon. This product is cute and pretty compact (great for small spaces!) but I was disappointed in the scratches all over the plastic and some "rough edges" that they appeared to try to sand down or something causing more scratches. Also, if I had realized Target had for the same price, I'd have ordered there with the likelihood I'd get a better quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You will need a drill for assembly.
customer_reviews.text: I love this little kitchen set. My grandson is 13months old and loves it. He can’t reach the microwave yet but will in a few months. I’m sure he will play with it for a few years. It was well made for the price. I would have given it 5 stars but I had to drill holes to connect the top to bottom. I don’t know why they weren’t predrilled but I noticed everyone has had the same problem. So over all I would recommend this item!!
customer_reviews.author: Cc

customer_reviews.title: Nice play kitchen set!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this kitchen set for my 2 year old son. He loved it! The microwave and the stove make sounds. It was easy to put together. It looks very nice in his play room. You do have to have three sets of batteries (two AA for the stove, another two AAA for the phone and two AA for the microwave). Great price and my son had a blast playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Tatyana M

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Some of the prices don’t fit quite right or are a bit bent. There isn’t very much storage and the plates it comes with don’t fit in the top cabinets (though they do fit in the fridge or oven). It is not the most durable kitchen but for the price, it is good. It is also a smaller kitchen that takes up much less space than others I’ve seen which is nice for us since we live in a small space. My 2.5 yo absolutely loves it though so totally worth the money spent for us.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna M.

customer_reviews.title: Pieces don't fit and some are warped.
customer_reviews.text: We put together this kitchen set the night before Christmas and it was a real disappointment. Step 2 is generally pretty good quality, but not this one. The plastic holes where the doors were to fit inside were bent so the oven door won't stay in place, the cabinet doors were warped so they won't shut. We ended up leaving one of the doors completely off because it was so bad. We tried to bend and pry the pieces to fit but that wasn't possible.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: prefect for our 1yr old, can't beat the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our daughters first birthday. (After looking for months and reading a bazillion reviews) It's the perfect size for our small, toy packed, apartment. Seemed easy enough to assemble (husband did it, I just put the batteries in and the stickers on :-) ) she really likes it, all the noises and buttons are great and its low enough she can reach the cupboards. Only complaint is that the microwave panel/door don't line up right so the microwave is really hard to open but could easily be corrected if you don't mind making your own screw hole for the control panel. (We just leave it open)
customer_reviews.author: Birdy7117

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a toddler!
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews. I have an issue with the door staying completely shut but to be honest it’s expected with a plastic toy. Yes, you need a drill (small) to make holes. I do not recommend using a screw driver for any of this. It’ll save time and frustration. Very easy to put together. The decals took the longest because of precision and I also had a toddler in front of me playing with this as I unboxed it. Smaller than I had expected it to be but perfect in size. I was worried it would not fit in a small area and it is perfect for our needs.
customer_reviews.author: Maranda Ahlfeld

customer_reviews.title: Defective and poor plastic quality
customer_reviews.text: So upsetting to open a Xmas present which is defective, plastic is scratched and cracked on a side. And when your little one is waiting for it to be assembled and saw the present it’s impossinle to return and wait for replacement. I’ve purchased Step product as was previously familiar with its very high quality. This experience was disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Iuliia

customer_reviews.title: Needs more storage
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad little unit. My biggest problem with this is that the cabinets, microwave and oven are small and will hold very some items but not a lot. The cabinets won't even hold the plates that come with it. But the electronic parts were a big hit for my grandson. The burner, microwave and telephone all need batteries but they do entertain the kids.
customer_reviews.author: brownd379

customer_reviews.title: Kid and his parents love playing with it
customer_reviews.text: Kid and his parents love playing with it. The cooking sounds are so cute, esp the microwave sound, lil guy thinks it's hilarious haha the size of this is just right, and not too big to take over a playroom but big enough for a 16 month old to feel like he really has a kitchen so he doesnt have to play in mom's! I also love that it came with kitchen accessories!
customer_reviews.author: SamSaKi

customer_reviews.title: Like it, but limited.
customer_reviews.text: Fun little kitchen for my 2 yr old granddaughter. Love the lights and sounds of the frying pan and pot, love the coffee pot, phone with sounds, microwave sounds and lights. Other than that, it could use more detail in the oven and refrigerator. In retrospect, I would buy a more "functional" larger toy kitchen. It would provide more play opportunity and be used more frequently and over a longer period of time. For the price, this is a great kitchen, maybe for a grandparents home.
customer_reviews.author: Seren

customer_reviews.title: Doors don't close properly
customer_reviews.text: I thought the price was great!-- But when we went to assemble it the doors were very flimsy and didn't close right. We did end up getting a replacement which seemed to be a little better. If it wouldn't have been cutting it close with time for my daughters birthday present, we would have returned for full refund. However, I did like that it wasn't huge like some of the other kitchen sets.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Let's Cook!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift. I was considering a wooden kitchen only because I loathe plastic. She loves it; great sounds and adorable kitchen for small space! It was easy to put together. Arrived quickly. Excellent packaging. Great gift for 2 year old! Has held up well they said. I would buy the (awful plastic) kitchen again because it made a special little one very happy ~
customer_reviews.author: Doo Dah Dae

customer_reviews.title: Great kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: This product was for my 2 year old. For her age she's over 3 foot tall herself, this kitchen was the perfect size for her. My only real complaint is the phone is behind the burners so she has to move all the pots to get to it. Also the stickers were kinda hard to put on. One of the cabinet doors is a tad bit off centered but she hasn't noticed. The burner makes different sounds depending on which pot or pan she uses. The storage in it is kinda small though, I wouldn't buy a lot of extras to go with it. It's a great purchase. Was our second attempt at a kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Hedgcorth

customer_reviews.title: Perfect kitchen for any kid!
customer_reviews.text: This kitchen is great! Perfect size for my 4 year old and it will be fine as she gets older. If u dont have a very big space this is perfect! Easy to move around the sound effects and storage in it are great!!!!
customer_reviews.author: B.E.A.U.TIFUL

customer_reviews.title: Purchased as a Christmas gift for my Granddaughter.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this last year as a Christmas gift for our Granddaughter so she would have something to play with when she was over. She loves it. It's the first thing she goes to when she comes over and now our 1 year old Grandson also loves it. It has gotten lots of use since Christmas and it's still in great shape. They also love all the sounds, like the microwave beeping and the sound the burner makes when you have something on it for cooking. It was a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: h

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 2+ Years Old
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 2 year old granddaughter and she loves playing with it. The sounds for the stove, microwave, and phone are great. We had no problems putting it together. The upper cupboards and microwave are a bit stiff to open (for a 2 year old) so we anchored the top of the kitchen to the wall so it doesn’t lean forward as she’s pulling on those doors. Overall extremely pleased for the $ and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: MrsSeldawg

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together, small, but cute
customer_reviews.text: My 3y/o daughter wanted a new kitchen so I bought her this, and its cute, she enjoys it for the most part. It is small, and kinda difficult for her to play with without another surface to put her  ̈recipes ̈ together. I would buy this again, but if it was on sale, its nothing amazing.
customer_reviews.author: shaylynn

customer_reviews.title: Little kitchen is great for my little chefs
customer_reviews.text: My little chefs love the little kitchen Only complaint would be the two top little cabinet doors don’t close flush and are little hard to open but the boys just don’t try to close them It doesn’t bother them so that is what counts Microwave Fridge and Oven doors open and close great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous and SO Fun!
customer_reviews.text: We have always opted for wooden presend kitchens but we decided to go for this plastic one because it is exactly what our child wanted. It was easy to assemble and it is really cute. It comes with noise functions for items on the stove and phone. It comes with some food and other extras. It is so great for sparking imagination!
customer_reviews.author: Mich

customer_reviews.title: The only problem I had with it was one of the cupboard doors was warped pretty bad. It doesn't close
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my grandson who is 21 months old. He just loves it! The only problem I had with it was one of the cupboard doors was warped pretty bad. It doesn't close. I would think the quality control person should have caught the issue since the door is already assembled on. I would have given it 5 stars if it wasn't for the door. Otherwise, it was great. He loves the sounds the microwave makes when he cooks food in it.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Meech

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Adorable and great in a small space. My toddler LOVES it, one of her favorite toys of the month. Put it up against a wall as my toddler likes to stick her body thru the opening, not the safest thing. The stickers don't seem to want to stick 100%.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Wynn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for your lil cook
customer_reviews.text: My almost 2 year old daughter loves being in the kitchen so I decided to get this for Christmas and she is constantly playing with it. Comes with a lot and easy to assemble. Price was good and it's by a trusted brand so the value of it was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Quesada

customer_reviews.title: Cute & Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This set was purchased for my granddaughter's 1st birthday. Super sturdy, easily put together and no small or pointy parts that could be dangerous. The phone works, the microwave has sounds and even does popcorn sound. She loves it and I recommend this over the toddler size because it will still be the right size when she's 5. Definitely a deal!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne McClinton

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son who turning 3 and enjoys spending time with me in kitchen. My kid is loving this kitchen set. The assembly was easy. The connector does not have the holes so you need some manual labor but it was not difficult. I did all by myself in like 15 minutes. If you have electric drill then it will be even faster. Highly recommend for kids who love kitchen activities.
customer_reviews.author: sonia

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift for grandkids
customer_reviews.text: The kids LOVED this and we couldnt get it unpacked quick enough! They played with it the whole time we were there and are still playing with it. Great buy also bought couple other pieces that went with it. Will be buying more of Melissa & Doug products for the kids Great value and quality!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dayna

customer_reviews.title: Nice compact size, plastic may be warped.  Stickers don't stay on.
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived in good condition. Put together the set relatively easily. One of the cabinet doors was warped slightly so it doesn't close all the way. Also, the decorative stickers started falling off after just a few weeks. Other than that, it's a fun, smaller size kitchen for toddlers and preschoolers.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan & Megan

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful play kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great kitchen!! There are a lot of cool features like different sounds/lights on the burners, phone, and microwave! What I love most about it is it's a smaller kitchen which is great for bedrooms or for smaller spaces in general like an apartment. This comes with pots/pans, plates, utensils, and play food! My nieces each got one and play with them every day!
customer_reviews.author: Jessi

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 2 yr olds birthday. She loves it. Comes with enough food and kitchen stuff to keep her interest for a little while every day. Easy to set up. The fridge door seems a little loose. I'd be careful if i had a kid who likes to play a little rough.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: Grandkids love this! It's compact enough for even the smallest room yet has everything they love. It's so cute and makes fun cooking sounds. I have one at my house and they enjoyed so much, I bought another one for their house.
customer_reviews.author: HOMEMOM

customer_reviews.title: Nice little play kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 3 and 5 year olds and they love this kitchen. It's obviously a teensy bit short for the 5 yr old but she doesn't mind at all, and really she can use it pretty comfortably. I love that it came with a bunch of accessories and that the assembly was really easy. For my sanity's sake, I didn't put batteries in it, but it still seems to be enjoyable for them. I got a plastic storage bin for easy accessory storage since we got more toy food and cooking sets since the kitchen's purchase.
customer_reviews.author: T.

customer_reviews.title: Step 2 Lifestyle Fresh Accents Kitchen is awesome! It went together easily and everything fit like ...
customer_reviews.text: Step 2 Lifestyle Fresh Accents Kitchen is awesome! It went together easily and everything fit like it was supposed to. (This grandma put it together with no problem. Just need a couple of different screwdrivers and you're good to go! It just took a couple hrs. including sticker placement, and I wasn't hurrying.) The stickers are VERY good - fit perfectly in spaces they belong, and look very accurate and professional. My 3 yr. old granddaughter (was her 3rd Birthday present) was/is THRILLED with it, and her 1 yr. old brother loves it to! Perfect choice! I couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Webb

customer_reviews.title: It lights up and makes sounds!!!
customer_reviews.text: Our 2 year old son ADORES his new kitchen. The phone and microwave both have lots of buttons that make noise when you press them. And the range even lights up and makes sounds depending on which pan you put on. GREAT gender-neutral purchase for your little one! His 4 yr old friend even came over and enjoyed playing with it too.
customer_reviews.author: Libby

customer_reviews.title: We love this because it's a full set up kitchen but ...
customer_reviews.text: Cannot beat this price! We love this because it's a full set up kitchen but it's not as wide as most play kitchens so it takes up less precious space. I originally wanted a cute retro kitchen that looked more sophisticated but realized for the price and the durability of this over particle board as well as the size, this one won out. It came with just enough play food and dishes that we didn't have to splurge on more (yet). A wonderful surprise is the phone that beeps as well as the microwave that has buttons/beeps. Super fun for a 3 and 1 year old.
customer_reviews.author: jen

customer_reviews.title: Came dirty and scraped up.  Just OK enough to keep.
customer_reviews.text: The product is nice and the kids like playing with it. I was very disappointed with the condition it arrived in. From the box to the stickers every piece was dirty and scraped. See photos.
customer_reviews.author: suave

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size. Three year old granddaughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size. Three year old granddaughter loves it. It's big enough to where she will be able to have fun with it for years to come. However, it's not so big that it takes up a lot of space. This makes it an excellent choice if you were to use it in a small bedroom, or ever wanted to move it into a different room.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my grandkids! So glad I bought!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good size. My three-year-old grandson and my two-year-old granddaughter both thoroughly enjoy it. It was easy to put together. The sounds that the burner make with the pots and pans, the microwave, and the telephone alll make cute noises and they’re not loud enough to be annoying Lol. I would recommend this product to anyone. In my opinion it was worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Ami

customer_reviews.title: This was the best we found for the price and we would recommend ...
customer_reviews.text: We've had this for most of a year and our 2.5 year-old does not tire of it. He loves the sounds it makes, and to store random things in the doors. He pretends to run water and loves the phone it came with. We researched the options to death because our budget is tight. This was the best we found for the price and we would recommend it to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Nygelis

customer_reviews.title: Just the right size!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has played with this nonstop since she opened it Christmas morning. It was very easy to assemble and she just lobes the sound affects. The coffee pot fits on the burner and triggers the boil sound effect too. I am very happy with this purchase. We were looking for a set that would not be too large, but still have plenty of play space and this fits the bill perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Traci Parker

customer_reviews.title: Storage is inadequate
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for our 2 year old granddaughter. I am disappointed in the storage capacity. The dishes that came with the kitchen don't fit in the upper cabinets. We haven't been able to fit the faucet into the sink.
customer_reviews.author: Patsy Schutte

customer_reviews.title: Best pretend play toy
customer_reviews.text: Everything just like i thought it would be my 3 & 4 year old wake up forget about breakfast and go straight to their little kitchen and try to cook me some food lOl
customer_reviews.author: Vee

customer_reviews.title: Great little kitchen, the perfect size and features!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for! My 2 year old is obsessed with the kitchen (after all, that's where everything tasty happens!) and when this box came into the living room, he couldn't contain his excitement! It's kept him entertained and out of my kitchen for hours! For that alone, I give it 5 stars! Easy to assemble, stickers stay on, and I love that the microwave, phone, and range make noise (not loud, but fun for him).
customer_reviews.author: The Best Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: not bad - both my kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Overall, not bad - both my kids love it. Installation was tricky- there are no holes for screws - you literally need to punch through the plastic to install each screw.
customer_reviews.author: Shihab Ullah

customer_reviews.title: Very good buy for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little kitchen for my 2 year old grandchild. Plenty of accessories and the little pot and frying pan make cool noises and lights to simulate cooking. Very simple to put together. The micro wave and phone make appropriate sounds and the phone drew instant attention. All in all a very good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Chew2

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: I am the father and I think the kids have way to many toys. This was a great gift for them to keep them busy and learning. It works great and actually provides many hours of fun for them.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Adorable kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really cute kitchen with lots of fun features, given it’s smaller footprint. My granddaughter LOVES it especially the microwave buttons that make noise like a real one, and the little “coffeemaker”. The storage compartments are small, (for example, the plates don’t fit in the microwave, only the pot and the bowls and cups provided) but if you have a bin or basket nearby to store everything, works out great. Huge hit!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: So cute! You won't be disappointed!!
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my 3 year old daughter. While a lot of gifts can be hit or miss with her this one is still going strong. It is the perfect size for her. I keep it in the kitchen so she can "cook" with me and the neutral colors blend right in with our own color scheme. It comes with plastic pots & pans and some play food. Like some other reviews have stated, there isn't a lot of storage space so I plan on getting some small shelving to store the pots and food so I can add more of it. This was a great buy. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: A great kitchen set for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great kitchen set for the price range! Our 4 year old son loves it. This set has everything, so you don't need to buy dishes or food. The extras like the lights on the stove top and microwave buttons make it even more fun. The window in the kitchen is great for playing drive thru serving.
customer_reviews.author: dotmom

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: It is small - good for three year olds and under. The dishes that come with it don't even fit in the cupboards. The plastic doors are thin and don't close well. Spend the extra $25 - $50 dollars and get a better one. The noise for the boiling pots is cute.
customer_reviews.author: Andreakicks

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my nephew for him at Christmas, he is one, a year later him and my 5 year old son still play with it. Came with no damage, all parts were in box and great price for the make ad model! It will get many years of use out of it!
customer_reviews.author: Salina Rubalcava

customer_reviews.title: Kids love
customer_reviews.text: Looks exactly as is... does not include the batteries needed, and there are not pre cut holes for the screws in some areas, so it was hard to screw together but overall great product. You will need 4 double a batteries and 2 triple a batteries.
customer_reviews.author: toni

customer_reviews.title: If your looking for something very simple and compact this would be fine, but if your kid is really into pretend ...
customer_reviews.text: Very compact design. Gets only 3 stars because the cabinets are not deep enough to put plates in them, has zero counter space to play, and needs more buttons and less stickers. Ours came missing the coffee pot. Was not the hardest thing to put together, but also not the easiest. If your looking for something very simple and compact this would be fine, but if your kid is really into pretend cooking look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Charles A Mooney

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my 15 month old. Very easy to install, took 20 minutes max, all you need is a screw driver. It’s a great starter kitchen for a child, the accessories it comes with are great.
customer_reviews.author: Breana

customer_reviews.title: 😡 instructions would be helpful!
customer_reviews.text: Though assembly doesn't seem to be rocket science, one would agree that instructions would certainly be helpful and save time when trying to put together a Christmas gift the day before Santa comes! Let's hope we can put it together to look like the box- especially since half of the decorative stickers are ruined from being carelessly folded and shoved in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Unhappy!!
customer_reviews.text: The product did not come with the accessory package. No screws, or kitchen parts. Tomorrow is Easter and my granddaughter is going to very unhappy. Thanks Step 2.
customer_reviews.author: John Philips

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for little toddler
customer_reviews.text: We got this kitchen for my almost 2 year old. Fairly easy assembly except we needed to find an extra small screw driver to install the burner. It’s the perfect size for her but doesn’t take up too much space. No items were missing or damaged. Sturdy hard plastic. Was opened and assembled a few weeks ago.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: It isn't a separate part it looks like it comes shipped already in the base
customer_reviews.text: The door for the oven is missing. I'm not sure how to report it. It isn't a separate part it looks like it comes shipped already in the base.
customer_reviews.author: Teri Ford

customer_reviews.title: Fun for toddlers, good size, some doors are hard to open.
customer_reviews.text: Very cute little kitchen. My 2 year old loves it! My only complaints are a couple of the doors are little difficult to open for a toddler, and the microwave door was cracked upon opening the box. It’s minor so I’m not going to go through the hassle of returning it and everything but still very annoying that it’s brand new and already cracked. But overall, a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Best price for this model
customer_reviews.text: Ours came with a warped upper cabinet door also. Other than that it was the perfect gift from Santa to our 3year old son.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old son loves his kitchen it came with a lot of accessories. The stove makes bubbling noises and lights up, the Phone and microwave makes noises. I like that it’s not huge and doesn’t take up a lot of space and it’s sturdy! Well worth the price and gender neutral!
customer_reviews.author: AN

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for preschooler. Well made.
customer_reviews.text: My almost 3 year old granddaughter loves this. She plays with is constantly. Very well made and sturdy. She calls me all the time on her pretend phone. I love the lights on the burner when she puts the pots on them. It is compact but has everything a mini kitchen needs for tons of play time. Storage in oven and microwave for dishes and pots. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela  Rutledge

customer_reviews.title: Great starter kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Very well suited for the small child. It's packed with a lot in a little space and has several nice sound and light effects. Adding this--after several months still in great shape and well loved by grandson.
customer_reviews.author: peb

customer_reviews.title: SO CUTE!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my triplet grand daughters as a gift for their second birthday. They love it, and it fit in their playhouse. The best part is they look so cute playing kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: John A.

customer_reviews.title: My Grandson Loves It!!!
customer_reviews.text: This little play kitchen is very sturdy as is most Step-2 products. I am very pleased and thrilled that he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Koenig

customer_reviews.title: perfect kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Excellent kitchen set. Easy to assemble-sturdy thick plastic- not cheap at all. Detailing really nice & nice dishware too. Play with it for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My kids are still playing with this kitchen. It was a gift for their 3rd birthday (twins) and so far, nothing is broken! It's tall enough for the average 3-4 yr old to reach and for 2 children to comfortably play alongside each other. There were many cups, bowls, play food, etc that came with it so as soon as assembly was complete they were ready to start "Cooking". The stove has the sound effects and visuals of something cooking, which makes it seem realistic for the kids.
customer_reviews.author: LB2309Z

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to put together! It honestly took me 20 minutes to assemble and another 10 to put the decals on. All you need are screwdrivers. The wholes are not pre-drilled, but I was able to very easily get the screws where they needed to be with very little effort. There is plenty of storage for the accessories that came with the kitchen, plus plenty of left over space if you wanted to buy more play food. This little kitchen is exactly what we were looking for as a Christmas gift for our daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Nature Lover

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for little girls or boys who want to play "kitchen".
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for a church Christmas gift drive and was really happy with it. Of course, we had to open it and see it for ourselves. Very well constructed and came with lots of dishes, kitchen tools, etc., to enhance child-play.
customer_reviews.author: Carl L. Roof

customer_reviews.title: it was fine for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute little compact kitchen. I purchased it to replace a larger one that had been more expensive but older. This is more for the size of a 2 or 3 year old and they really enjoyed it. I also have a 5 year old granddaughter and it is much too short for her. i wish the compartments were a little deeper to house the items that came with it but all in all for the price it is cute and the little ones are enjoying it. I did not get rid of the older one as I had planned as this was much too small for my 5 year old!
customer_reviews.author: E. Woodworth

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old boy loves this kitchen. The phone and microwave and stove make sounds! He loves it
customer_reviews.author: Katie Sweeney

customer_reviews.title: Compact, cute, complete
customer_reviews.text: My daughter lives it. The boiling/cooking sound the stove makes is adorable. There are several doors and utensils. Great Christmas gift!
customer_reviews.author: STEPHANIE P. EILERT

customer_reviews.title: Missing the refrigerator door
customer_reviews.text: I should have listened to the other reviews, but I took a chance and ordered this anyway for my granddaughter. When her daddy put it together on Christmas Eve we found out the refrigerator door was not in the package! Who's packing these things??! You pay good money for something I think you should get ALL the parts!
customer_reviews.author: R. Amato

customer_reviews.title: Great Kitchen!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little kitchen!!! All my grandkids love to play with it. Very easy to assemble!! Good quality!! Great price! Cheaper than the competitors and free shipping!!!! Came with lots of dishes. The phone makes sounds. The microwave panel makes sounds. The burners make sounds when the pot are placed on the "burner". I would recommend this kitchen to anyone!!!
customer_reviews.author: cork999

customer_reviews.title: Great choice for playtime
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves this kitchen set! It's inexpensive but very durable and comes with everything needed for playtime. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Mason

customer_reviews.title: Gift for Grand
customer_reviews.text: A Christmas present for my grand daughter. Meets all expectations of the description
customer_reviews.author: Beth Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Great for a 2 year old.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter LOVES this. The stove makes a cooking noise and the microwave makes noise as well. It's just the right size for my 2 year old. It would be nice to have some storage for the items that come with it and the food you have to buy.
customer_reviews.author: TLowery

customer_reviews.title: Easy and fun kitchen set.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her kitchen set. It was fairly easier to put together. The Directions were only pictures so wasn’t hard to follow. The stickers are peeling off already and I’ve only had it for about a week. It’s not a big deal but is unfortunate.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: This is adorable very easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This is adorable very easy to assemble. We didn't need to use a drill for the screws . We started the holes before we attached the pieces together. With two of us it took about 30 minutes to put together. Very pleased with the product. This is a birthday gift for our two year old granddaughter. Love the neutral colors.Great for girls or boys.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Cute.... needs rechargeable screwdriver for assembly.
customer_reviews.text: This kitchen is cute, I did have to purchase a rechargeable screwdriver to put it together..... a little tricky. But it is ready for the grands!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great basic kitchen
customer_reviews.text: My 2yr old received this kitchen for Christmas and loves it. It has all the basics with a few special features (microwave sounds, stove boils, etc.) I was also plesantly surprised at how many dishes and faux food pieces were included. I wish it offered more food/dish supply room. Everything is narrow, so nothing wide will fit into the oven or fridge. As an example a salad plate would be too wide. This means that a lot of after market buys are too large to neatly store within the kitchen
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my almost two year old granddaughter for Christmas and she absolutely LOVES it! Made very well and pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Bridges

customer_reviews.title: Not installed by me
customer_reviews.text: The door on top on the right side as you look from the front was not installed properly at the factory this was not something I install. After moving it back and forth the door cracked and now I have to give this to my Grand Daughter tomorrow broken. It would be nice if some one from the company would send me a replacement door. craig4945666@msn.com thanks
customer_reviews.author: craig karish

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, light, comes with food and cookware. Best on the market
customer_reviews.author: soulfull68701

customer_reviews.title: The kids love it
customer_reviews.text: There weren't pre drilled holes for some stuff but overall still easy to put together. Overall very nice and the kids love it. The microwave and stove make cooking sounds.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel P

customer_reviews.title: Perfect price perfect product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kitchen for my daughter's first bday. She absolutely loves it. She loves all of the sounds the kitchen makes (microwave, phone, boiling pots...). She is still a bit small to reach the top cabinets, but she loves playing with the kitchen. What I didn't expect was how much my 4-yr-old would love it. He plays restaurant all the time. He is above average height and the kitchen is not too small for him. Actually the size of the kitchen suits him better than my daughter. So happy I made this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Lanziegal

customer_reviews.title: Daughter Loves It
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves it. Pros: Compact size makes it fit great in our home. Has Stove, Fridge, Oven, Microwave and Sink Comes with good starter kit of kitchen food and accessories. Cons: Compact size means it is a bit small. The cabinets don't quite hold the plates. Oven door is easy to pull out (but, it doesn't break, and can be placed back in easily. Because its small, hard to fit all the accessories and any extra that are bought. Overall, this is a great play kitchen and my daughter will be playing with it for a few years.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin B

customer_reviews.title: Great if you are tight on cash and budget!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2 year old. She has had it for about 6 months now and still uses it. We don't have a ton of space and are tight on cash, but I wanted something nice looking. She loves that it makes sounds. It looks really nice and was exactly what I was looking for. It was easy to put together. It was missing the Microwave door but I notified the manufacturer and they quickly mailed the piece to me no questions asked.
customer_reviews.author: Stowaway

product_meta.title: Step2 Lifestyle Fresh Accents Kitchen
product_meta.description: The compact design of the Lifestyle Fresh Accents Kitchen playset includes all of the realistic kitchen amenities little ones and adults expect Junior chefs can explore fun features like the working oven, microwave and refrigerator doors, pretend to wash dishes in the molded-in sink with faucet, and more Invite friends over with a quick pretend phone call and make a fresh pot of coffee with the molded-in coffee station and coffee pot before they arrive. Then, get cooking with the kitchen playset’s stovetop featuring a fun clickable knob and realistic cooking sounds for added sensory play. Plus, just press the keypad buttons to activate the fun microwave sounds After dinner, keep leftovers in the extra-large refrigerator – and it even has a pretend water and ice maker station, just like a real one The pass-through window provides an engaging social play opportunity when friends are over, too. Made in the USA of US and imported parts.
feature_bullets: Special frying pan and boiling pot with lid activate electronic frying and boiling water sounds in stove’s front burner
Includes coffee pot with molded-in coffee maker
Features “stainless steel” microwave, refrigerator and oven. Heat up the fun with the microwave’s electronic key pad
Includes 30-piece accessory set (accessories may vary): phone, 10-pc play food set, pot and pan w/ lids, dishes, bowls, silverware, and salt and pepper shakers
Note: Refer the Specification Sheet given on Technical Specification for Components details.
Stylish kitchen with “window” for loads of imaginative play , Recommended age - 2 and up

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars1,079 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
